abilities.title: Luminous Aura
abilities.description: Emits a radiant aura that heals nearby allies and damages enemies.

abilities.title: Wingblades
abilities.description: Unfurls razor-sharp blades from its wings, dealing massive damage to enemies.

abilities.title: Aurora Burst
abilities.description: Unleashes a powerful blast of energy that damages enemies and stuns them.

encounters.outcome: Successful encounter, with the Luminawing granting the captain a blessing of good fortune.
Failed encounter, with the Luminawing attacking the team and forcing them to retreat.

relatedLegends.title: The Luminawing's Gift
relatedLegends.source: The Ancient Chronicles of the Aurora Isles

relatedLegends.title: The Luminawing's Curse
